attributes.action: force the FA into replacing Steve McLaren with Jose Mourinho, immediately.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition is simple enough, Mourinho in - McLaren out. Although McLaren is doing a reasonable job for managing the national side, a manager of Jose Mourinho's pedigree doesn't come about too often. This petition urges The FA to make its move now and snap him up whilst he's available and we may well see some long overdue glory!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
